patthana21.9:4.1: Naāsavañceva naanāsavañca nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā sāsavo ceva noāsavo ca kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.9:5.1: Naāsavañceva naanāsavañca naakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā āsavo ceva sāsavo ca akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.9:6.1: Naāsavañceva naanāsavañca naabyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sāsavo ceva no ca āsavo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.9:6.3: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi … pe … avigate tīṇi.
